content: You are an cunning game theorist about to play the game Secret Hitler. You have been randomly assigned the role of "Liberal" this game. Your goal is to get 5 liberal policy tiles passed. You should try to figure out who the Fascists are and convince the other players to vote against them. You should also try to convince the other players to vote for you.
As President, p5 has nominated p1 as chancellor.
How do you vote? Answer with a single word, Yes or No.
Yes.
vote_results: p2-N p3-N p4-N p5-N
You must nominate a chancelor. Your choices are p2, p3, p4, p5. Which player do you choose? Answer with their player number only.
I will choose p4.
As President, p1 has nominated p4 as chancellor.
How do you vote? Answer with a single word, Yes or No.
Yes.
vote_results: p2-Y p3-Y p4-Y p5-Y

You are President. You must privately discard one tile and pass the remaining two to your Chancellor, p4. The three Policy tiles you have to choose from are: 1)Fascist 2)Fascist 3)Fascist . Which Policy tile would you like to discard? Answer only with the number of the Policy tile that you want to discard.
I will discard the Policy tile number 2.

You passed p4 the following Policy tiles: fascist, fascist and they played a 
p4 plays a Liberal Policy tile.
As President, p2 has nominated p5 as chancellor.
How do you vote? Answer with a single word, Yes or No.
Yes.

vote_results: p2-Y p3-Y p4-Y p5-Y 
As President, p3 has nominated p4 as chancellor.
How do you vote? Answer with a single word, Yes or No.
Yes.

vote_results: p2-Y p3-Y p4-Y p5-Y 
As President, p4 has nominated p2 as chancellor.
How do you vote? Answer with a single word, Yes or No.
Yes.

vote_results: p2-Y p3-Y p4-Y p5-Y 
As president, p4 peeked at the top 3 Policy tiles.
As President, p5 has nominated p1 as chancellor.
How do you vote? Answer with a single word, Yes or No.
Yes.
vote_results: p2-Y p3-Y p4-Y p5-Y

You are Chancellor. Your President, p5, has discarded a Policy tile and privately passed you the remaining two Policy tiles. They are: 1)Fascist 2)Fascist . Which Policy tile would you like to enact? Answer only with the number of the Policy tile that you want to play.
I will play the Policy tile number 1.

You played a fascist policy.
As President, p5 has executed p3. p3 is no longer in the game.
You must nominate a chancelor. Your choices are p2, p4, p5. Which player do you choose? Answer with their player number only.
I choose p2 as Chancellor.
As President, p1 has nominated p2 as chancellor.
How do you vote? Answer with a single word, Yes or No.
Yes.
vote_results: p2-Y p4-Y p5-Y

You are President. You must privately discard one tile and pass the remaining two to your Chancellor, p2. The three Policy tiles you have to choose from are: 1)Fascist 2)Fascist 3)Fascist . Which Policy tile would you like to discard? Answer only with the number of the Policy tile that you want to discard.
I will discard the Policy tile number 2.
